name: Math.sign
description: The Math.sign() function returns either a positive or negative +/- 1, indicating the sign of a number passed into the argument. If the number passed into Math.sign() is 0, it will return a +/- 0. Note that if the number is positive, an explicit (+) will not be returned.

refs.name: ECMAScript (ECMA-262)
refs.description: The definition of 'Math.sign' in the 'ECMAScript (ECMA-262)' specification.
